attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what all the hype was about and boy, was I wrong for doing so.  I opened it and was immediately bombarded by insults from Bunker Boy Trump. He called me a radical antifa terrorist and a libtard. He also told me that women should not be having babies in the ninth month of pregnancy! What a gross thing to say! There were also many pictures of what I can only describe as a disappointment to the human race; a monstrosity. I think they called him Donald Trump or something. These disgusting images and words made me puke so hard, I went into a coma and I am now facing very expensive medical bills that I canâ€™t pay off. THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE!!!! IF I COULD GIVE ZERO STARS I WOULD!
